title: Trying to climb this new account with Aatrox, but Bronze man...
body:
And guess what, its not even Aatrox that is the problem. I can't carry a team that has a {{champion:45}} support with 21 deaths and no vision, who fed the shit out of enemy {{champion:119}} .

Seriously, I forgot how awful bronze is. Its a fucking crap shoot. You can play poorly and win, you can play great and lose, both are nearly equally as likely.

replies.body: Well not anymore. Used to with the old one.  What I mean was, you know do well and win because some of your teammates also do well
lol complaning about Bronze? That Veigar died 21 times? Get 30 kills. Bronze is a joke they literally run into you in lane.
Mate you have like 4-5 accounts in bronze to silver... are you sure it's everyone else that's the problem?
